Description: Limestone ostracon. 11 lines on recto and 3 lines on verso containing a letter.
Bibliographic references: Biedenkopf-Ziehner 2000a / Koptische Ostraka I: Ostraka aus dem Britischen Museum in London (248-252, pl.32)
Delattre 2002 / CR de O.Brit.Mus.Copt. II et O.Ashm.Copt. (p.332)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (82897) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/82897)
Acquisition name: Exchanged through: Egypt Exploration Fund (probably from the Excavation 1910-11)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Brit.Mus.Copt. II 31 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
